de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.postprocessing.filters

Class MotionFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.postprocessing.filters.Filter<MotionFilter>
      • de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.postprocessing.filters.MotionFilter

  • public class MotionFilter
extends Filter<MotionFilter>
    Motion blur filter that draws the last frame (motion filter included) with a lower opacity.
    Author:
    Toni Sagrista
